TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompilerParameters extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)
System.Serializable

summary.span: 表示用于调用编译器的参数。

span.span: Represents the parameters used to invoke a compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示 接口的设置和选项。A object represents the settings and options for an interface. 如果要编译可执行程序，则必须将 属性设置为 `true`。If you are compiling an executable program, you must set the property to `true`. 将 设置为 `false`时，编译器将生成一个类库。When the is set to `false`, the compiler will generate a class library. 默认情况下，会将新的 初始化，并将其 属性设置为 "`false`"。By default, a new is initialized with its property set to `false`. 如果要从 CodeDOM 图编译可执行文件，则必须在该图中定义 。If you are compiling an executable from a CodeDOM graph, a must be defined in the graph. 如果有多个代码入口点，则可以通过将类的名称设置为 属性来指示定义要使用的入口点的类。If there are multiple code entry points, you can indicate the class that defines the entry point to use by setting the name of the class to the property. 您可以在 属性中指定输出程序集的文件名。You can specify a file name for the output assembly in the property. 否则，将使用默认的输出文件名。Otherwise, a default output file name will be used. 若要在生成的程序集中包含调试信息，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To include debug information in a generated assembly, set the property to `true`. 如果项目引用了任何程序集，则必须将程序集名称指定为 中的项设置为调用编译时使用的 的 属性。If your project references any assemblies, you must specify the assembly names as items in a set to the property of the used when invoking compilation. 可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`来编译写入内存而不是磁盘的程序集。You can compile an assembly that is written to memory rather than disk by setting the property to `true`. 在内存中生成程序集时，代码可从 的 属性中获取对生成的程序集的引用。When an assembly is generated in memory, your code can obtain a reference to the generated assembly from the property of a . 如果将程序集写入磁盘，则可以从 的 属性获取生成的程序集的路径。If an assembly is written to disk, you can obtain the path to the generated assembly from the property of a . 若要指定暂停编译的警告等级，请将 属性设置为一个整数，表示暂停编译的警告等级。To specify a warning level at which to halt compilation, set the property to an integer that represents the warning level at which to halt compilation. 你还可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`，将编译器配置为在遇到警告时停止编译。You can also configure the compiler to halt compilation if warnings are encountered by setting the property to `true`. 若要指定在调用编译进程时使用的自定义命令行参数字符串，请在 属性中设置该字符串。To specify a custom command-line arguments string to use when invoking the compilation process, set the string in the property. 如果在调用编译器进程时需要 Win32 安全令牌，请在 属性中指定该令牌。If a Win32 security token is required to invoke the compiler process, specify the token in the property. 若要在编译的程序集中包括 .NET Framework 资源文件，请将资源文件的名称添加到 属性中。To include .NET Framework resource files in the compiled assembly, add the names of the resource files to the property. 若要在另一个程序集中引用 .NET Framework 资源，请将资源文件的名称添加到 属性中。To reference .NET Framework resources in another assembly, add the names of the resource files to the property. 若要将 Win32 资源文件包含在已编译的程序集中，请在 属性中指定 Win32 资源文件的名称。To include a Win32 resource file in the compiled assembly, specify the name of the Win32 resource file in the property. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含应用于所有成员的类级别的链接要求和继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方或派生类不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例为简单的 Hello World 程序生成一个 CodeDOM 源关系图。The following example builds a CodeDOM source graph for a simple Hello World program. 然后，将该源保存到文件中，将其编译为可执行文件，然后运行。The source is then saved to a file, compiled into an executable, and run. `CompileCode` 方法演示如何使用 类指定各种编译器设置和选项。The `CompileCode` method illustrates how to use the class to specify various compiler settings and options. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置调用编译器时使用的可选命令行参数。

span.span: Gets or sets optional command-line arguments to use when invoking the compiler.

value.span: 用于编译器的任何附加命令行参数。

span.span: Any additional command-line arguments for the compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常会在调用命令行编译器时在命令行上包含此字符串。An typically includes this string on the command line when invoking a command-line compiler. 默认情况下，此属性包含空字符串。By default, this property contains an empty string. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CoreAssemblyFileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CoreAssemblyFileName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置包含基类类型（如 、 或 ）的核心或标准程序集的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the core or standard assembly that contains basic types such as , , or .

value.span: 包含基本类型的核心程序集的名称。

span.span: The name of the core assembly that contains basic types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值是空字符串或 `null`，则编译器将使用默认核心程序集。If the value of this property is an empty string or `null`, the compiler uses the default core assembly. 根据编译器版本，默认核心程序集可能是位于 Framework 目录或引用程序集目录中的 mscorlib.dll 或 System.Runtime.dll。Depending on the compiler version, the default core assembly may be mscorlib.dll or System.Runtime.dll in a Framework directory or reference assembly directory. 如果此属性的值不为空，则代码文档对象模型 (CodeDOM) 将显式引用指定程序集并发出导致编译器在编译期间不隐式引用任何程序集的编译器选项。If the value of this property is not empty, the Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) explicitly references the specified assembly and emits compiler options that cause the compiler to not reference any assemblies implicitly during compilation.. 对于默认情况下仅隐式引用核心或标准程序集的编译器，此属性可单独使用。For compilers that reference the core or standard assembly only implicitly by default, this property can be used on its own. 对于隐式引用核心或标准程序集之外的程序集的编译器，使用此选项可能需要指定 属性中的其他条目。For compilers that implicitly reference assemblies in addition to the core or standard assembly, using this option may require specifying additional entries in the property. > [!NOTE] > 或 实现可以选择忽略此属性。An or implementation may choose to ignore this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EmbeddedResources As StringCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取要在编译程序集输出时包含的 .NET Framework 资源文件。

span.span: Gets the .NET Framework resource files to include when compiling the assembly output.

value.span: 一个集合，包含要在生成的程序集中包含的 .NET Framework 资源的文件路径。

span.span: A collection that contains the file paths of .NET Framework resources to include in the generated assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嵌入的资源内置于生成的程序集输出文件中。Embedded resources are built into the generated assembly output file. 通过此属性包含文件类似于许多 .NET Framework 编译器支持的 `/resource` 命令行参数。Including files through this property is similar to the `/resource` command-line argument supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 并非所有编译器都支持 .NET Framework 的资源文件，因此，您应通过使用标志 调用 方法来测试此支持。Not all compilers support .NET Framework resource files, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . 将一个或多个 .NET Framework 资源文件路径添加到返回的 ，以将文件资源嵌入到已编译的程序集中。Add one or more .NET Framework resource file paths to the returned to embed the file resources in the compiled assembly. 添加重复或无效文件路径会导致编译错误;确保每个字符串都指定有效 .NET Framework 资源文件的唯一路径。Adding a duplicate or invalid file path results in compilation errors; ensure that each string specifies a unique path to a valid .NET Framework resource file. 使用 包括程序集 .NET Framework 资源的默认或非特定区域性;使用 属性可引用附属程序集中 .NET Framework 的资源。Use to include default or neutral culture .NET Framework resources for an assembly; use the property to reference .NET Framework resources in satellite assemblies. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取当前源中引用的 .NET Framework 资源文件。

span.span: Gets the .NET Framework resource files that are referenced in the current source.

value.span: 一个集合，包含源要引用的 .NET Framework 资源的文件路径。

span.span: A collection that contains the file paths of .NET Framework resources that are referenced by the source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 链接资源文件允许程序集引用 .NET Framework 资源，而无需将实际资源嵌入程序集。Linked resource files allow your assembly to reference .NET Framework resources without embedding the actual resources in the assembly. 通过此属性引用文件类似于许多 .NET Framework 编译器支持的 `/linkresource` 命令行参数。Referencing files through this property is similar to the `/linkresource` command-line argument supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 并非所有编译器都支持 .NET Framework 的资源文件，因此，您应通过使用标志 调用 方法来测试此支持。Not all compilers support .NET Framework resource files, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . 向返回的 添加一个或多个 .NET Framework 资源文件路径，以创建已编译程序集中资源的链接。Add one or more .NET Framework resource file paths to the returned to create links for the resources in the compiled assembly. 添加重复或无效文件路径会导致编译错误;确保每个字符串都指定有效 .NET Framework 资源文件的唯一路径。Adding a duplicate or invalid file path results in compilation errors; ensure that each string specifies a unique path to a valid .NET Framework resource file. 使用 引用附属程序集中的 .NET Framework 资源（针对特定区域性进行了本地化）;使用 属性将资源嵌入到已编译的程序集中。Use to reference .NET Framework resources in satellite assemblies, localized for a particular culture; use the property to embed the resources into the compiled assembly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReferencedAssemblies As StringCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取当前项目所引用的程序集。

span.span: Gets the assemblies referenced by the current project.

value.span: 一个集合，包含由源引用以进行编译的程序集名称。

span.span: A collection that contains the assembly names that are referenced by the source to compile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串集合应包含当前项目所引用的程序集，或包含这些程序集。The string collection should consist of, or include, the assemblies referenced by the current project. 将程序集文件名添加到返回的 以导入程序集清单，并在当前项目中引用程序集类型信息。Add assembly file names to the returned to import the assembly manifest and reference the assembly type information in the current project. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::CodeDom::Compiler::TempFileCollection ^ TempFiles { System::CodeDom::Compiler::TempFileCollection ^ get(); void set(System::CodeDom::Compiler::TempFileCollection ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置包含临时文件的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection that contains the temporary files.
A collection that contains the temporary files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编译器活动完成后，将根据集合中 属性的值保留或删除集合中的临时文件。The temporary files in the collection are retained or deleted upon the completion of compiler activity based on the value of the property in the collection. 如果使用 构造函数创建集合，并将 `keepFiles` 参数设置为 `true`，则设置 属性。The property is set if the collection is created using the constructor with the `keepFiles` parameter set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含应用于所有成员的类级别的链接要求和继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方或派生类不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置要链接到已编译程序集中的 Win32 资源文件的文件名。

span.span: Gets or sets the file name of a Win32 resource file to link into the compiled assembly.

value.span: 要链接到已编译程序集中的 Win32 资源文件。

span.span: A Win32 resource file that will be linked into the compiled assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此属性链接文件类似于许多 .NET Framework 编译器支持的 `/winres` 和 `/winresource` 命令行参数。Linking files through this property is similar to the `/winres` and `/winresource` command-line arguments supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 使用 将 Win32 资源文件编译到程序集。Use to compile a Win32 resource file into the assembly. 使用 或 通过 .NET Framework 的资源文件进行编译。Use or to compile with .NET Framework resource files. 并非所有编译器都支持 Win32 资源文件，因此，你应在链接资源文件之前，通过使用标记 调用 方法来测试此支持的代码生成器。Not all compilers support Win32 resource files, so you should test a code generator for this support before linking a resource file by calling the method with the flag .
